KLAN WARS

by Lord Graga

Released Mar 1, 2002
Players 1
License Unknown

Download ROM

Description

A strategic "cult" game. You now have 300$ to buy a "klan", which may maximaly consist of 15 members. The controls ingame are simple. Just move the cursor around with the D-PAD and press A the choose a troop. The troop will move to the next spot that is selected if you press A again, but only if it has enough move, or enough range to fire within.
